title: Another Group of HOF's and commons for sale Prices lowered on most cards 2-10-20
author: Pat R

posts.post_title: Another Group of HOF's and commons for sale Prices lowered on most cards 2-10-20
posts.post_content:
Prices are a no fee payment add 3% if paying with paypal goods.
Shipping is $3 for one card and $4 for multiple cards.

Abbaticchio brown sleeves PSA 3 [STRIKE]$50[/STRIKE] $45

Ball NY PSA 4.5 [STRIKE]$95[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$90[/STRIKE] $85

Conroy with bat Polar Bear PSA 3.5 [STRIKE]$90[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$85[/STRIKE] $70

Covaleski PSA 4[STRIKE] $85[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$80[/STRIKE] $70

Crandall no cap PSA 2.5 $37

Criss trimmed? $20 Sold

Donlin seated [STRIKE]$35[/STRIKE] $30

Jennings portrait SGC 20 [STRIKE]$90[/STRIKE][STRIKE] $80[/STRIKE] $65 Sold

McGraw portrait no cap SGC 50[STRIKE] $210[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$200[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$190[/STRIKE] Sold

Seymour batting PSA 3.5[STRIKE] $65[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$60[/STRIKE] $55

You can view bigger scans of these cards and the cards still available in the
other thread here the password is net54 [url]https://imageevent.com/patrickr/bstforsale[/url]

Prices reduced more on some cards.

I've had a few people ask about marks on the backs of some cards
many of these are doubles from my plate scratch research and that's
what the marks are.

You can read about them in these threads 

[url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=159666[/url]
